page.title: 02RECREATION
page.content: The recreation ground down Pasture Lane in Hathern has two toilets .The things put there for children to play on are:three tyres,four swingstwo roller-barrels and one slide.There is a roundabout.There is a cricket pitch with pavilion and also a football pitch.In another area of the village is a recreation area which has a slide, swings,a climbing frame which is the shape of a catapillar,two tyre swings and one tyre for babies.There are three climbing frames shaped like men and one shaped like a frog, while another is shaped like a snail.There is a bench for the mothers to sit on while they watch their children play.Long Whatton recreation ground has a slide, swings,tyre swings,a climbing frame shaped like a rocket.one roundabout,two benches.
